articles.title: Actor Rakesh Bedi duped out of Rs 85,000 by scamster posing as Army officer - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Actor Rakesh Bedi was scammed out of Rs 85,000 by a conman posing as an Army officer. Oshiwara Police registered a complaint in the matter on December 30.
